measured_by: interaction (reward × transition) coefficient from the two-step task logistic regression
justification: “The regression coefficient for the interaction between reward and transition was taken as a measure of model-based decision making.”

measured_by: main effect of reward coefficient from the two-step task logistic regression
justification: “The regression coefficient for the main effect of reward was taken as a measure of model-free decision making.”

measured_by: ED50 (delay producing 50 % value loss) derived from the monetary choice task
justification: “To compare discounting between different discount functions, we computed the delay at which a delayed reward loses 50 % of its subjective value (ED50).”

measured_by: average log-transformed internal-detail score on the Test of Episodic Future Thinking (automated DistilBERT scoring)
justification: “To obtain a future thinking specificity score for each participant, we simply took their average log-plus-one-transformed score from the automated method.”

measured_by: total score on the Future Self-Continuity Questionnaire
justification: “To measure self-continuity, we used a web-based implementation of the Future Self-Continuity Questionnaire… We also computed a total self-continuity score by averaging responses to all questions.”
